document.full_text: ubs looked to put the financial crisis behind it on tuesday, with money pouring into its core wealth management arm in the first quarter and its struggling investment bank doing better than expected.
document.title: ubs sees money pour back as it rebuilds trust
lines_and_colors: ubs looked to put the financial crisis behind it on tuesday, with money pouring into its core wealth management arm in the first quarter and its struggling investment bank doing better than expected.
